subject: Olympic Games (2016)
lead_paragraph: Brazil will not fulfill its commitment to clean up Rio de Janeiro’s sewage-filled Guanabara Bay, where the Olympic sailing events are to be held, by the 2016 Olympics, state environmental officials acknowledged in a letter.
